mapper.insert: insert into establish (establishcode, establishnamekor, establishnameeng, status, slipstatus, clientstatus, usestatus) values (#{establishCode},#{establishNameKor} ,nvl(#{establishNameEng, jdbcType=VARCHAR},null) ,#{status} ,nvl(#{slipstatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR},null) ,nvl(#{clientStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR},null) ,#{useStatus})
mapper.select: select establishcode, establishnamekor, establishnameeng, status, slipstatus, clientstatus, usestatus from establish
select establishcode, establishnamekor, establishnameeng, status, slipstatus, clientstatus, usestatus from establish where establishcode = #{establishCode}
select establishcode, establishnamekor, establishnameeng, status, slipstatus, clientstatus, usestatus from establish where establishNameKor like '%'||#{establishNameKor}||'%'
